name: com.unity.ui.runtime
description:
UIElements is a retained-mode UI toolkit for developing user interfaces in Unity. UIElements is based on recognized web technologies and supports stylesheets, dynamic and contextual event handling, and data persistence.
This package provides GameObject components that enable UIElements to be used in games.

samples.description: A simple repeat-the-sequence game that support touch interaction.
Move squares with your fingers. Supports multi-touch.
